# ino-table-cell

The ino-table-cell is a sub-component of the ino-table-row which in turn is a sub-component
of the ino-table. Its main purpose is to add data or header cells to a corresponding data or header row.

## Usage

The component can be used as follows:

```html
<ino-table-row header-row>
  <ino-table-cell numeric> 1 </ino-table-cell>
  <ino-table-cell> Cell content </ino-table-cell>
</ino-table-row>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                     | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `numeric` | `numeric` | Indicates that the cell contains numeric values | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description    |
| ----------- | -------------- |
| `"default"` | The cell value |
